channel.title: redis on Pengjielee's blog
channel.description: Recent content in redis on Pengjielee's blog

item.title: Redis基础
item.description: Redis Redis（remote dictionary server）是一个基于KEY-VALUE的高性能的存储系统 Docker安装redis $ docker pull redis $ docker run --name myredis -d -p 6379:6379 redis $ docker ps CONTAINER ID IMAGE COMMAND CREATED STATUS PORTS NAMES c92daf4edbfe redis "docker-entrypoint.s…" 32 seconds ago Up 32 seconds 0.0.0.0:6379->6379/tcp myredis 连接redis $ redis-cli -v redis-cli 7.0.9 $ redis-cli 127.0.0.1:6379> 字符串 1、设置和获取键值对：get / set 127.0.0.1:6379> set name jim OK 127.0.0.1:6379> get name "jim" 2、查询是否存在和查询所有键： exists / keys 127.0.0.1:6379> exists name (integer) 1 127.
